00026 namespace cxx {
00027 /*
00028  * Classes: List_item, List<D, Alloc>
00029  */
00030 
00037 class List_item 
00038 {
00039 public:
00045   class Iter
00046   {
00047   public:
00048     Iter(List_item *c, List_item *f) throw() : _c(c), _f(f) {}
00049     Iter(List_item *f = 0) throw() : _c(f), _f(f) {}
00050     
00051     List_item *operator * () const throw() { return _c; }
00052     List_item *operator -> () const throw() { return _c; }
00053     Iter &operator ++ () throw()
00054     {
00055       if (!_f)
00056   _c = 0;
00057       else
00058         _c = _c->get_next_item(); 
00059 
00060       if (_c == _f) 
00061   _c = 0; 
00062       
00063       return *this; 
00064     }
00065     
00066     Iter operator ++ (int) throw()
00067     { Iter o = *this; operator ++ (); return o; }
00068       
00069     Iter &operator -- () throw()
00070     {
00071       if (!_f)
00072   _c = 0;
00073       else
00074         _c = _c->get_prev_item(); 
00075 
00076       if (_c == _f) 
00077   _c = 0; 
00078       
00079       return *this; 
00080     }
00081     
00082     Iter operator -- (int) throw()
00083     { Iter o = *this; operator -- (); return o; }
00084 
00086     List_item *remove_me() throw()
00087     {
00088       if (!_c)
00089   return 0;
00090 
00091       List_item *l = _c;
00092       operator ++ ();
00093       l->remove_me();
00094 
00095       if (_f == l)
00096   _f = _c;
00097 
00098       return l;
00099     }
00100 
00101   private:
00102     List_item *_c, *_f;
00103   };
00104   
00118   template< typename T, bool Poly = false>
00119   class T_iter : public Iter
00120   {
00121   private:
00122     static bool const P = !Conversion<const T*, const List_item *>::exists 
00123       || Poly;
00124     
00125     static List_item *cast_to_li(T *i, Int_to_type<true>) throw()
00126     { return dynamic_cast<List_item*>(i); }
00127 
00128     static List_item *cast_to_li(T *i, Int_to_type<false>) throw()
00129     { return i; }
00130 
00131     static T *cast_to_type(List_item *i, Int_to_type<true>) throw()
00132     { return dynamic_cast<T*>(i); }
00133 
00134     static T *cast_to_type(List_item *i, Int_to_type<false>) throw()
00135     { return static_cast<T*>(i); }
00136 
00137   public:
00138 
00139     template< typename O >
00140     explicit T_iter(T_iter<O> const &o) throw()
00141     : Iter(o) { dynamic_cast<T*>(*o); }
00142 
00143     //TIter(CListItem *f) : Iter(f) {}
00144     T_iter(T *f = 0) throw() : Iter(cast_to_li(f, Int_to_type<P>())) {}
00145     T_iter(T *c, T *f) throw()
00146     : Iter(cast_to_li(c, Int_to_type<P>()),
00147   cast_to_li(f, Int_to_type<P>())) 
00148     {}
00149     
00150     inline T *operator * () const throw()
00151     { return cast_to_type(Iter::operator * (),Int_to_type<P>()); }
00152     inline T *operator -> () const throw()
00153     { return operator * (); }
00154     
00155     T_iter<T, Poly> operator ++ (int) throw()
00156     { T_iter<T, Poly> o = *this; Iter::operator ++ (); return o; }
00157     T_iter<T, Poly> operator -- (int) throw()
00158     { T_iter<T, Poly> o = *this; Iter::operator -- (); return o; }
00159     T_iter<T, Poly> &operator ++ () throw()
00160     { Iter::operator ++ (); return *this; }
00161     T_iter<T, Poly> &operator -- () throw()
00162     { Iter::operator -- (); return *this; }
00163     inline T *remove_me() throw();
00164   };
00165 
00166   
00167   List_item() throw() : _n(this), _p(this) {}
00168 
00169 protected:
00170   List_item(List_item const &) throw() : _n(this), _p(this) {}
00171   
00172 public:
00174   List_item *get_prev_item() const throw() { return _p; }
00175 
00177   List_item *get_next_item() const throw() { return _n; }
00178  
00180   void insert_prev_item(List_item *p) throw()
00181   {
00182     p->_p->_n = this;
00183     List_item *pr = p->_p;
00184     p->_p = _p;
00185     _p->_n = p;
00186     _p = pr;
00187   }
00188   
00190   void insert_next_item(List_item *p) throw()
00191   {
00192     p->_p->_n = _n;
00193     p->_p = this;
00194     _n->_p = p;
00195     _n = p;
00196   }
00197 
00199   void remove_me() throw()
00200   {
00201     if (_p != this)
00202       {
00203         _p->_n = _n;
00204         _n->_p = _p;
00205       }
00206     _p = _n = this;
00207   }
00208 
00217   template< typename C, typename N >
00218   static inline C *push_back(C *head, N *p) throw();
00219 
00228   template< typename C, typename N >
00229   static inline C *push_front(C *head, N *p) throw();
00230   
00239   template< typename C, typename N >
00240   static inline C *remove(C *head, N *p) throw();
00241 
00242 private:
00243   List_item *_n, *_p;
00244 };
00245 
00246 
00247 /* IMPLEMENTATION -----------------------------------------------------------*/
00248 template< typename C, typename N >
00249 C *List_item::push_back(C *h, N *p) throw()
00250 {
00251   if (!p)
00252     return h;
00253   if (!h)
00254     return p;
00255   h->insert_prev_item(p);
00256   return h;
00257 }
00258 
00259 template< typename C, typename N >
00260 C *List_item::push_front(C *h, N *p) throw()
00261 {
00262   if (!p)
00263     return h;
00264   if (h)
00265     h->insert_prev_item(p);
00266   return p;
00267 }
00268 
00269 template< typename C, typename N >
00270 C *List_item::remove(C *h, N *p) throw()
00271 {
00272   if (!p)
00273     return h;
00274   if (!h)
00275     return 0;
00276   if (h == p)
00277     {
00278       if (p == p->_n)
00279   h = 0;
00280       else
00281         h = static_cast<C*>(p->_n);
00282     }
00283   p->remove_me();
00284 
00285   return h;
00286 }
00287 
00288 template< typename T, bool Poly >
00289 inline
00290 T *List_item::T_iter<T, Poly>::remove_me() throw()
00291 { return cast_to_type(Iter::remove_me(), Int_to_type<P>()); }
00292 
00293 
00299 template< typename D, template<typename A> class Alloc = New_allocator >
00300 class List
00301 {
00302 private:
00303   class E : public List_item
00304   {
00305   public:
00306     E(D const &d) throw() : data(d) {}
00307     D data;
00308   };
00309   
00310 
00311 public:
00312   class Node : private E
00313   {};
00314   
00315   typedef Alloc<Node> Node_alloc;
00316 
00321   class Iter
00322   {
00323   private:
00324     List_item::T_iter<E> _i;
00325 
00326   public:
00327     Iter(E *e) throw() : _i(e) {}
00328 
00329     D &operator * () const throw() { return (*_i)->data; }
00330     D &operator -> () const throw() { return (*_i)->data; }
00331 
00332     Iter operator ++ (int) throw()
00333     { Iter o = *this; operator ++ (); return o; }
00334     Iter operator -- (int) throw()
00335     { Iter o = *this; operator -- (); return o; }
00336     Iter &operator ++ () throw() { ++_i; return *this; }
00337     Iter &operator -- () throw() { --_i; return *this; }
00338 
00340     operator E* () const throw() { return *_i; }
00341   };
00342 
00343   List(Alloc<Node> const &a = Alloc<Node>()) throw() : _h(0), _l(0), _a(a) {}
00344 
00346   void push_back(D const &d) throw()
00347   { 
00348     void *n = _a.alloc();
00349     if (!n) return;
00350     _h = E::push_back(_h, new (n) E(d));
00351     ++_l;
00352   }
00353 
00355   void push_front(D const &d) throw()
00356   { 
00357     void *n = _a.alloc();
00358     if (!n) return;
00359     _h = E::push_front(_h, new (n) E(d));
00360     ++_l;
00361   }
00362 
00364   void remove(Iter const &i) throw()
00365   { E *e = i; _h = E::remove(_h, e); --_l; _a.free(e); }
00366 
00368   unsigned long size() const throw() { return _l; }
00369  
00371   D const &operator [] (unsigned long idx) const throw()
00372   { Iter i = _h; for (; idx && *i; ++i, --idx) ; return *i; }
00373 
00375   D &operator [] (unsigned long idx) throw()
00376   { Iter i = _h; for (; idx && *i; ++i, --idx) ; return *i; }
00377 
00379   Iter items() throw() { return Iter(_h); }
00380 
00381 private:
00382   E *_h;
00383   unsigned _l;
00384   Alloc<Node> _a;
00385 };
00386 
00387 
00388 };
